-1.title: The Garden as Public Park: Battery Park, Teardrop Park, Gantry Plaza State Park and Brooklyn Bridge Park

imdb.plot outline: Garden Story is a ten-part series for public television. Over the past five years, the Garden Story team has explored gardens from North Carolina to Massachusetts to Missouri. Focusing on the relationship between garden and gardener in a refreshing variety of settings, they are weaving stories of how gardens transform our lives and our communities.
imdb.title: Garden Story
plot: _Garden Story_ (qv) is a ten-part series for public television. Over the past five years, the _Garden Story_ (qv) team has explored gardens from North Carolina to Massachusetts to Missouri. Focusing on the relationship between garden and gardener in a refreshing variety of settings, they are weaving stories of how gardens transform our lives and our communities.::Bill Reifenberger
